question: The Union Government has proposed to introduce how many ordinances in the upcoming monsoon session of Parliament?
explanation:
The Union Government has proposed to introduce 11 ordinances in the upcoming Monsoon Session of Parliament.
These ordinances pertain to various ministries including Health Ministry, Finance Ministry and Agriculture Ministry. The Monsoon Session would commence from 14th September and will continue till 1st October without any break. Several preventive measures have been put in place at the Parliament for the safety of participants.
